root.name: Spider-Man & Venom: Separation Anxiety
root.description: Spider-Man Venom: Separation Anxiety is a side scrolling beat 'em up game and a sequel to Spider-Man Venom: Maximum Carnage.. Released in 1995 this game developed by acclaim features co-op play with a freind. One being Spider-Man and one being Venom. You team up in this game to defeat carnage and Venom's symbiote spawned children. All versions of the game are alike. The game has multiple cameo appearances by other characters on the Marvel roster.Similar to its prequel Separation Anxiety has its own new cast of supporting summons to help you on your quest.Marvel Cameos (Appear as summons to aid and assist you on your journey)Hawkeye: Rains arrows down upon his enemies.Ghost Rider: Beats up on all enemies on screen using his chain.Captain America: Captain America throws his shield hitting all enemies on the screen.Daredevil: Hits all enemies on the screen with his baton.
